sinama karmanthaye abhiwrudhiya gana sanathgen granthayak prawina rangana shilpi sanath gunathilaka sinamawa arabaya liyu aluthma kruthiya ‘sinhala sinamawa saha mama‘ heta sawasa 2.30 kolambaa saundarya wishwa widyaliya shalawedi eli dakweyi seri prakashana thunak ada dorata wadi mandawela pagnygnyawanha himiyan wisin rachitha swathanthra kawya nirmanaya ‘wiprawasikayage swadeshantanaya‘ athulu seri prakashana thunak ada (8) sawasa 3.00 ta pathika puskala sewa mandala shrawanagarayedi eli daki sindrella hi tharuna athdakim apata bohoma samipayi-pubudu chathuranga langadima pubuduge sinama ranganayak apita dakinna labenawa neda?

amerika eksath janapadaya pramukha batahira kalliya shri lankawata erehiwa genena yojanawata wiruddhawa paksha bedayen thorawa siyalu dena ekwiya yuthu bawa jathika hela urumaye sabhapathi, parlimenthu manthri athuraliye rathana himiyo pawasuha.eksath janapadaya kumana upakrama bhawitha kala da kiyubawa dana gassawimata owunta nohaki wu bawada rathana himiyo kiha.rajya thula waradi thibenawa nam eewata balapam kala yuththe wideshiya rukada lesa nowana bawa da athuraliye rathana himiyo prakasha kalaha.parlimenthu manthri athuraliye rathana himiyo ese prakasha kale eeye (26) kolambaa di pawathi madhya hamuwak amathamini.ratak asthawara wuwahoth eya rate winashayata balapanawa.

esema ithihasaye di men nowa kisidu ranawiruwekuge widesha sancharayanta kisidu badhawak athi nowana bawatath ma tharaye awadharanaya kara sitinawa.” “siyaludena wisinma itha dushkaratha madhyaye labagath samaya, rate saubhagyaya athikirimehila thawaduratath pawathwa ganime wadagathkama awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya danata pawathina yahapath thaththwaya idiriyatath pawathwa ganimata rajaya wisin sama uthsahayakma ganna bawath, shri lanka yuddha hamudawa anagathayedi lowa wishishta hamudawangen ekak bawata pathkirimata katayuthu karana bawath prakasha kalaha.”

ghathana rasak sidukala pathala nayaka mamasmige kalliye prabalayan hathdenaku soya aarakshaka buddhi ansha rata pura pulul meheyumak kriyathmaka kara thibe.mowun minis ghathana hathalis thunak pamana sidukara athi bawata me wana wita heliwi athayi buddhi ansha pawasayi.mamasmi ikuth da wishesha karya balakaya samanga athi wu gatumakin maranayata pathwiya.wasaraka kalayak luhu banda wishesha karya balakaya ohu athadanguwata gaththa da mamasmi samanga ekata ghathana sidu kala ohuge pradhana golayan methek athadanguwata ganimata nohaki wi atha.kappam ganim, biya waddim, paharagena yam athulu aparadha rasak mowun ekwa sidukara thibena bawata polisiya ha buddhi ansha anawaranaya karagena thibe.athadanguwata ganimata niyamitha sakakaruwan ratin panagos ath da yanna pilibanda methek thorathuru heliwa nathi athara wenath namwalin ho rahasigathawa muhudu margayen pana yamata mowun uthsaha daranne dayi sakakarana buddhi ansha ee pilibanda da soya balima sandaha kandayamak yodawa thibe..
hondayi anguru hadana widiya igena gaththa kiyala warthamana samajayata ee tharam eeka wadagath wenne na kiyala hithenna puluwan,,.

paranawithana mahatha meheyawana pahan pujawa.maharagama siri wajiranyana dharmayathanaye duruthu poda tharuna shila samadana pinkama meseya.poda perawaru6.00 – 7.00 - sil samadan karawima, anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa - panditha shasthrapathi hakmana sumanasiri himi, 8.00 – 9.00 - bhawanawa walimada pasanna manasa himi, 9.00 – 10.00 - dharma deshanawa - shasthrapathi walapane nyanasena himi, 10.00 – 11.15 - paropakara sangrahaya – dharma deshanawa ha buddha pujawa - shasthrapathi panditha mahaoya anuruddha himi, paswaru 12.25 – 12.30 - wishesha niwedana ha punyanumodana 12.30 – 1.00 - pirith ha theruwan guna - bangaladeshaye sumanawansha himi, 1.00 – 2.00 - dharma sakachchawa - shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 2.00 – 3.00 wesesi desuma - waidya bi.ee.rathnapala mahatha 3.00 – 4.00 - dharma deshanawa kanampalle sumanananda himi, 4.15 – 5.00 - dhammapadaya – panditha gabbela wajira himi, 5.00 – 6.00 - dharma deshanawa - diyathalawe piyadassi himi, 6.00 – 6.30 - bodhi pujawa meheyawima - shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri, mahimi,wallawaththa jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthanaya wiharaye duruthu purapasaloswak poho dina dawasa pura pawathwena shila samadanaya maharagama mahinda nahimiyange anushasakathwayen pawathwe.poda perawaru 6.00 – 7.00 shila samadanaya anushasanawa ha bhawanawa mehewima shasthrapathi maharagama mahinda nahimi, 7.00 – 8.00 ude aahara buddha pujawa. 8.00 – 9.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi samaneliye piyadassi himi. 9.00 – 10.00 araliyagaha mandiraye sita wikashanaya wana dharma deshanawa. 10.00 – 11.00 aaradhitha deshanaya shantha jothiwansha mahatha. 11.00 – 11.30 dawal aahara buddha pujawa.paswaru 12.00 – 1.00 wiweka kalaya ha pirith deshanawa. 01.00 – 3.30 bhawanawa meheyawima gamini priyantha mahatha. 2.30 – 3.00 dam desuma wajiraramawasi kambaurugamuwe mahanaga himi. 4.00 – 5.00 dharma deshanawa pamankada sobhitha himi. 5.30 gilanpasa buddha pujawa ha sil pawaranaya maharagama mahinda nahimi.uyanwaththa walukarama maha wiharaye duruthu poda pinkama meseya.
